results.title: They Were Promised Coding Jobs in Appalachia. Now They Say It Was a Fraud.
results.abstract: Mined Minds came into West Virginia espousing a certain dogma, fostered in the world of start-ups and TED Talks. Students found an erratic operation.

multimedia.caption: Stephanie Frame near her home in Dixie, W.Va. Ms. Frame was one of several people in her community who signed up with Mined Minds, a nonprofit that promised to teach West Virginians how to write computer code and then get them good-paying jobs.

results.abstract: Make yourself an effortless spritz (not Aperol, perhaps?) and pair it with an easy salmon Niçoise salad, skillet greens with runny eggs or a farro salad.

results.title: Spring Art Sales: Yawns or Records?
results.abstract: Trophy names and a few surprises: For the first time, all three auction houses will include works by KAWS.

results.title: Many Hospitals Charge Double or Even Triple What Medicare Would Pay
results.abstract: A study of 25 states provides a rare glimpse of the stark disparities between what private insurers and the federal government paid for inpatient and outpatient care.

multimedia.caption: The Parkview Health System in Indiana had among the highest overall hospital prices compared to Medicare rates, according to a study of 25 states’ hospital pricing.

results.title: Making Playgrounds a Little More Dangerous
results.abstract: “I came to the counterintuitive conclusion that engaging in risk is actually very important in preventing injuries,” a researcher says.

results.title: Seeking Life in Antarctica? Look for the Penguins’ Outhouse
results.abstract: The continent, a researcher said, is the “ideal experimental lab,” for studying how nutrients relate to an ecosystem’s biodiversity.

results.title: Dinosaur With Bat Wings Was More Than Legend
results.abstract: Chinese scientists first thought it was a prehistoric bird, until chipping away at the fossil revealed surprising features.

multimedia.caption: Ambopteryx longibrachium, a newly discovered species of scansoriopterygid dinosaur with bat-like wings, found in Liaoning Province, China.
